issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Support int64 seed for udf random.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17658](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17658). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, there is `gdv_fn_random_with_seed` to support int32 seed in random udf. Need to support seed with type of int64 as well.
